Some of you who have been involved in the discussion on kamikaze 
pilots might be interested in this. The History Channel is having a 
program on at 10p.m. ET called "Military Blunders" that will be going 
over the Battle of Midway and the role of the kamikaze pilots during 
the war. I wonder if they'll bring up anything about their attempting 
to be like the samurai? It might be interesting to see what they have 
to say on the matter anyway.

-MissBehavin
